data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during TREMENDOUS cruise from Back Bay to Benkulen started at 1804-07-09
Ship: Tremendous (3rd Rate Frigate), Voyage: Back Bay, Trincomalee - Benkulen, 1st Observer: John Osborn (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 74G 1656BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
